home.whyDesc: Stop throwing away food and money. Start creating culinary magic with what you already have.
home.value1Desc: Snap a photo and our advanced AI instantly identifies your ingredients with 95% accuracy. No more typing or guessing!
home.value2Desc: Get personalized recipes that maximize your existing ingredients and minimize food waste. Save $50+ per month on groceries.
home.value3Desc: Track calories, macros, and nutritional goals automatically. Stay healthy while enjoying amazing food.
home.howDesc: Turn your kitchen chaos into culinary magic in 3 simple steps
home.howStep1Desc: Take a photo of your fridge, pantry, or individual ingredients. Our AI instantly recognizes everything with 95% accuracy.
home.howStep2Desc: Our AI analyzes your ingredients, dietary preferences, and cooking skills to suggest perfect recipes that minimize waste.
home.howStep3Desc: Follow step-by-step instructions with photos, videos, and tips. Create restaurant-quality meals from your leftovers!

home.social3Quote: Perfect for my student budget! I went from eating instant noodles to creating amazing meals with random ingredients. My friends are jealous!
